item.title: Up and Running with R + RStudio
item.description: Letâ€™s dive right in! This post will get new users of R up and running quickly. Getting Started If youâ€™ve never used R before, then you are in for a treat! The awesome people at RStudio are doing incredible work to help users of R be productive. RStudio is an open source (+commercial editions) Integrated Development Environment (IDE).

item.title: About
